title: Jobbatical
description: Jobbatical is a tech platform for relocation that makes processing employee visas and relocation 2x faster. We achieve this by automating all the most labour-intensive parts of the relocation process, eliminating a lot of manual work and making it easy to have a bird’s eye view of the process. This combination of technology and human expertise makes relocation on Jobbatical not just less stressful but also around three times less expensive compared to a legacy relocation service provider.
